name: Cinderella's Fairy Adventures
description:
Cinderella's Fairy Adventures is the ultimate adventure across a vast land. Cinderella comes across many unforeseen dangers and enemies as it follows a trail of magical coins and mystical objects that help her along its quest.

Game Feature
- Easy tap and fly motion game
- Endless runner style game with missions, obstacles and tonnes of fun
- Complete 3 Missions at a time
- Collect coins to get powerUps to enhance your game
- Collect coins to enable different player

Help Cinderella on this action packed adventure journey. This game is loads of fun. So what are you waiting for. Download and play Cinderella's Fairy Adventures, LIVE in the App Store, TODAY!
